TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 將物件序列化為新的型別。

span.span: Serializes an object to a new type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會執行相同的工作，但將物件序列化為透過此類別會定義新的型別。The class performs the same tasks as a , but serializing an object through this class defines a new type.

related.span: 動態原始程式碼的產生和編譯

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object Deserialize (System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration declaration);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Deserialize(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager, class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration declaration) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Deserialize (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager, declaration As CodeTypeDeclaration) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ Deserialize(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationManager ^ manager, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ declaration);

abstract member Deserialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration -> obj override this.Deserialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration -> obj

param.name: manager
param.span: 用於序列化的序列化管理員。

span.span: The serialization manager to use for serialization.

param.span: 要用於序列化的型別宣告。

span.span: Type declaration to use for serialization.

summary.span: 還原序列化指定的型別宣告 (Type Declaration)。

span.span: Deserializes the given type declaration.
The root object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法還原序列化先前序列化的程式碼型別宣告。The method deserializes a previously serialized code type declaration. 下表顯示工作預設實作會執行。The following table shows the tasks default implementation performs. |工作Task|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |區分大小寫檢查Case Sensitivity Checks|實作搜尋決定如果它應該將成員視為區分大小寫或不區分大小寫的服務。The implementation searches for a service to decide if it should treat members as case sensitive or case insensitive.| |陳述式排序Statement Sorting|所有成員變數和 init 方法的本機變數會都儲存在資料表中。All member variables and local variables from init methods are stored in a table. 然後在 init 方法中的每個陳述式加入至陳述式集合中根據其左上方，組成群組，以便指派或作業特定的變數上的所有陳述式之下該變數。Then each statement in an init method is added to a statement collection grouped according to its left-hand side, so all statements assigning or operating on a particular variable are grouped under that variable. 沒有陳述式的變數都會被捨棄。Variables that have no statements are discarded.| |還原序列化Deserialization|每個變數的陳述式集合會根據變數還原序列化。The statement collections for each variable are deserialized according to the variable.| 下表顯示服務方法需要。The following table shows the services the method requires. |服務Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||雖然不是絕對必要，服務，如果有的話，用來決定序列化是否要區分大小寫或不區分大小寫。While not strictly necessary, the service, if available, is used to determine if the serialization should be case sensitive or case insensitive.| ||如果物件不存在名稱表格中還原序列化期間，查詢為止。If an object does not exist in the name table during deserialization, a query for is made. 如果此查詢成功，會檢查物件的容器。If this query succeeds, the container is checked for the object. 容器也會做為替代的元件所需的任何容器引數。The container is also used as a stand-in for any container argument needed by components.|

span.span: or is .

The value to use for serialization.

summary.span: 傳回一個方法，而在該方法中會儲存用於序列化成員的陳述式。

span.span: Returns the method where statements used to serialize a member are stored.

returns.span: 用於為指定成員發出所有初始化程式碼的方法。

span.span: The method used to emit all of the initialization code for the given member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回指定成員發出所有初始化程式碼的方法。The method returns the method to emit all of the initialization code for the given member. 預設實作會傳回空的建構函式。The default implementation returns an empty constructor. 如果相同的方法是將傳回之多個值，應該會傳回相同的執行個體的方法。If the same method is to be returned for multiple values, the same instance of the method should be returned. 您可以使用字典記住您已建立的方法。You can use the dictionary to remember methods you have created. `typeDecl`參數也可用來新增基礎結構的方法。The `typeDecl` parameter can also be used to add infrastructure methods. 例如，如果您想要發出的每個物件不同的方法，您需要依次呼叫所有這些方法的單一方法。For example, if you want to emit a separate method for each object, you need a single method that calls all of these methods in turn. 這個方法可以加入所需的程式碼類型宣告。This method can be added to the code type declaration as needed.

span.span: , , or is .

span.span: A array of methods to be interpreted during deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會傳回在其建構函式的單一元素陣列。The default implementation returns a single-element array with the constructor in it.

Public Overridable Function Serialize (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager, root As Object, members As ICollection) As CodeTypeDeclaration

public: virtual System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ Serialize(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationManager ^ manager, System::Object ^ root, System::Collections::ICollection ^ members);

abstract member Serialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * obj * System.Collections.ICollection -> System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration override this.Serialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * obj * System.Collections.ICollection -> System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration

param.name: manager
param.span: 用於序列化的序列化管理員。

span.span: The serialization manager to use for serialization.
The object to serialize.
Optional collection of members.
Can be or empty.

summary.span: 藉由建立定義根 (Root) 的新型別宣告序列化物件根。

span.span: Serializes the object root by creating a new type declaration that defines root.
A that defines the root object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會序列化給定的根物件和要建立新的類型定義之成員的選擇性集合。The method serializes the given root object and optional collection of members to create a new type definition. 如果`members`集合包含值，這些值序列化。If the `members` collection contains values, these values are serialized. 做為成員變數或本機變數，將這些值可能會序列化。Values themselves may serialize as either member variables or local variables. 這項決定是藉由擴充項屬性上呼叫的物件搜尋`GenerateMember`。This determination is done by searching for an extender property on the object called `GenerateMember`. 如果`true`，成員就會產生。If `true`, a member is generated. 否則，會產生的本機變數。Otherwise, a local variable is generated. 為了方便起見，`members`集合可以包含根物件。For convenience, the `members` collection can contain the root object. 在此情況下，根物件不也會加入做為成員或本機變數。In this case, the root object is not also added as a member or local variable. 如果是具名的物件，傳回型別名稱是取自根物件的名稱。The name of the returned type is taken from the root object's name, if it was a named object. 如果沒有，則名稱簡單類型名稱的根類別中傳遞。If not, a name is fabricated from the simple type name of the root class. 下表顯示的預設實作所執行的工作方法。The following table shows the tasks performed by the default implementation of the method. |工作Task|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |植入的內容Context Seeding|序列化內容會使用資料，包括初始化和 The serialization context is initialized with data including the and | |成員序列化Member Serialization|下一步將逐步引導的所有成員和呼叫。Next, walks all of the members and calls . 因為序列化必須完成才視情況在，這可確保序列化未完成兩次。Because serialization is done opportunistically in , this ensures that serialization is not done twice.| |根序列化Root Serialization|接下來，將根物件序列化和它的陳述式新增至陳述式集合。Next, the root object is serialized and its statements are added to the statement collection.| |陳述式整合Statement Integration|所有物件都會都序列化之後，方法排序陳述式，並且將它們新增至方法，從傳回。After all objects are serialized, the method orders the statements and adds them to a method returned from . 最後，建構函式在其中傳遞呼叫的所有方法所傳回。Finally, a constructor is fabricated that calls all of the methods returned from .| - 下表顯示的物件方法置於內容堆疊。The following table shows the objects the method places on the context stack. |執行個體Instance|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||此序列化程式。This serializer. 衍生類別，可能會發現它可將加入這個類別的公用屬性。Deriving classes may find it useful to add public properties to this class.| ||正在建立的型別。The type being created. 大部分的物件不需要直接存取。Most objects do not need direct access to this.|
